text: Marie-Christine Ventrillon is an archer from France. She was born on 11 March 1949. She competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics.Ventrillon Bio, Stats, and Results | Olympics at Sports-Reference.comMarie-Christine VentrillonMarie Christine VENTRILLON == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:French archers Category:Olympians for France
title: Marie-Christine Ventrillon
